short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To buy or not to buy? Chaos Shopper decides!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add a bit of chaos to the online shopping experience. 

Do you find your indecisiveness mentally frustrating? Are your spending habits making your bank account cry? Or maybe you just find the whole online shopping thing too predictable.

Well then, let the Chaos Shopper make your decisions for you! 

When you're on a supported product page, just click on the Chaos Shopper button and it will either add the item to your cart or close the tab. Either way, you can move on with your life and stop thinking about it.

Currently supported sites:
‚úîÔ∏èAmazon
‚úîÔ∏èShein

Feel free to let me know if you have any suggestions for improvements or sites you'd like to see supported!

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

#####OPTIONS#####
üìäPercentage chance to buy: 
The higher you set this, the more likely the Chaos Shopper is to buy your product. 
At 100%, clicking the Chaos Shopper button is literally just adding it to your cart. 
At 0%, it will always close your tab.
Double-clicking the slider will reset the percentage to 50%.

‚ùåClose tab if item added to cart:
Your tab will close whether the Chaos Shopper decides you should buy the item or not.
This option can be useful to turn on if you have a few items that you're thinking of buying queued up in different tabs. This way, you can just click on the button and the tab will close whether or not the item is added to your cart, letting you chaotically shop through your backlog more quickly.

‚ú®Use animations:
Turns the Chaos Shopper button animation on or off.
